body: At 4th level, a paladin with this oath gains evasion, but only against the breath weapons of creatures with the dragon type. This ability replaces channel positive energy.
name: Breath Evasion
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Paladin/Paladin Archetypes/Oathbound Paladin/Oaths/Oath against the Wyrm/Breath Evasion
